benchmark_details.name: Datasets for Sentiment and Hate Speech Tasks
benchmark_details.overview: We present datasets for sentiment and hate speech tasks by translating from English to Bangla, Hindi, and Urdu, facilitating research in low-resource language processing.
similar_benchmarks: Davidson et al. Hate Speech Dataset

purpose_and_intended_users.goal: To facilitate research in low-resource language processing with new datasets aimed at sentiment and hate speech tasks.

data.source: Datasets were created by translating existing English datasets into Bangla, Hindi, and Urdu.
data.annotation: Translated from English; no explicit human verification for translations.

methodology.interpretation: Higher scores indicate better model performance.
